body_html:
the backend (cpp library) that contains the embedding layer is thnn, you can find it in torch.nn.backends.thnn.backend where you can access the autograd.Function called Embedding thus replacing self._backend.Embedding with nn.backends.thnn.backend.Embedding.

Awesome, thanks! Question: what happens if the incoming tensors are cuda tensors? will this continue to work ok?
